meanings.definition: Give the impression of being something.
meanings.sent2: It seems like a good idea to go for a walk.
meanings.sent3: The cat seems to think it's the boss of the house.
meanings.sent4: The stars seem to dance in the night sky.
meanings.sent5: The dark clouds seem to swallow the sun whole.

meanings.definition: Appear to be true or likely.
meanings.sent2: It seems that the train will arrive on time.
meanings.sent3: The cake seems to have disappeared magically.
meanings.sent4: The truth seems to hide behind a veil of lies.
meanings.sent5: The sound of laughter seems to fill the room with joy.
